title: Dr. Fallon's Soiree
description: “Family. Such an obnoxious part of the miracle of life.” Meet Elie Dubois, professional smartass.A seemingly benign summer job working for her uncle’s software encryption company turns into something else entirely when Elie’s trouble-loving uncle disappears leaving coastal California Elie stranded in the Midwest to pick up the pieces.
author: Samantha Standish
